name: Milos Adventure (Krasse-Nase)
description:
Welcome
Story

Milo is a little wizard. He trusted a wrong person an old mage of darkness who has stolen Milos magic. But Milo is very promising to get it back. So he started his journey from greenvillage to dark fortress. 

First Steps

The start is very easy. Milos robe gives him the abiltity to make very floaty and long jumps. It takes a bit practice to handle this mechanic. 


Movement

You can move Milo typical with WASD,  jump with SPACE or DOUBLE-SPACE and slide with STRG.

Credits Overall

Marvin Geritzlehner

Music and Soundeffects

 
www.epidemicsound.com

www.weloveindies.com
